Rule.Name: Set a nondeterministic shutdown command value (Automated)
Rule.Section: Set a nondeterministic shutdown command value
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The shutdown command is set to the default value ('SHUTDOWN'), which may allow unauthorized shutdown of the Tomcat server.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Set a nondeterministic shutdown command value in server.xml.

Rule.Name: Disable the shutdown port by setting it to '-1' (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: The shutdown port is enabled, which may allow unauthorized users to remotely shut down the server.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Disable the shutdown port by setting it to '-1' in server.xml.
